com.facebook.react.views.scroll

Class ReactHorizontalScrollView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • android.widget.HorizontalScrollView
            • com.facebook.react.views.scroll.ReactHorizontalScrollView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, ReactClippingViewGroup

    public class ReactHorizontalScrollView
extends android.widget.HorizontalScrollView
implements ReactClippingViewGroup
    Similar to ReactScrollView but only supports horizontal scrolling.

      • setRemoveClippedSubviews

        public void setRemoveClippedSubviews(boolean removeClippedSubviews)
        Description copied from interface: ReactClippingViewGroup
        Sets property removeClippedSubviews as a result of property update in JS. Should be called only from @{link ViewManager#updateView} method.

        Helper method ReactClippingViewGroupHelper#applyRemoveClippedSubviewsProperty may be used by ViewManager subclass to apply this property based on property update map ReactStylesDiffMap.

        Specified by:
        setRemoveClippedSubviews in interface ReactClippingViewGroup

        Overrides:

      • requestChildFocus

        public void requestChildFocus(android.view.View child,
                              android.view.View focused)
        Since ReactHorizontalScrollView handles layout changes on JS side, it does not call super.onlayout due to which mIsLayoutDirty flag in HorizontalScrollView remains true and prevents scrolling to child when requestChildFocus is called. Overriding this method and scrolling to child without checking any layout dirty flag. This will fix focus navigation issue for KeyEvents which are not handled in HorizontalScrollView, for example: KEYCODE_TAB.
        Specified by:
        requestChildFocus in interface android.view.ViewParent
        Overrides:
        requestChildFocus in class android.widget.HorizontalScrollView

      • addFocusables

                          int focusableMode)

      • updateClippingRect

        public void updateClippingRect()
        Description copied from interface: ReactClippingViewGroup
        Notify view that clipping area may have changed and it should recalculate the list of children that should be attached/detached. This method should be called only when property removeClippedSubviews is set to true on a view.

        CAUTION: Views are responsible for calling ReactClippingViewGroup.updateClippingRect() on it's children. This should happen if child implement ReactClippingViewGroup, return true from ReactClippingViewGroup.getRemoveClippedSubviews() and clipping rect change of the current view may affect clipping rect of this child.

        Specified by:
        updateClippingRect in interface ReactClippingViewGroup

      • getClippingRect

        public void getClippingRect(android.graphics.Rect outClippingRect)
        Description copied from interface: ReactClippingViewGroup
        Get rectangular bounds to which view is currently clipped to. Called only on views that has set removeCLippedSubviews property value to true.
        Specified by:
        getClippingRect in interface ReactClippingViewGroup
        Parameters:
        outClippingRect - output clipping rect should be written to this object.
